The TCS

LOGO

The logo of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is a visual representation of the company's identity and values. Over the years, the TCS logo has evolved to reflect the company's growth, values, and global presence. Here are key aspects of the TCS logo

  • Blue: The TCS logo typically features a blue color scheme, which signifies trust, reliability, and professionalism. Blue is commonly associated with technology and innovation.
  • Typography: The typography of the TCS logo is often clean and modern, reflecting the company's forward-thinking approach and global outlook.

Location of Headquarters

The headquarters of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is located in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Here is the address:
Tata Consultancy Services Limited
TCS House, Raveline Street, Fort, Mumbai - 400 001, Maharashtra, India

TCS Social Media Links

Evolution of TCStv Logo

"Over the course of 37 years, Microsoft has had five corporate logos. They changed quickly in the early years, but then the company held steady from 1987 until -- today. Ahead of a big wave of major product rollouts this fall, including Windows 8, Windows Phone 8, the Surface tablet, and the next version of Office, Microsoft has updated its logo once again, after 25 years of holding steady."
